overview:
Geoff Tidey is a co-founder & CTO of Lovefre.sh Limited. He likes to shepherd electrons.

Geoff has been working as a computer professional for almost 20 years. After leaving university his first job was “hacking” medical databases using a hex editor and lots of C. He went on to work for the first ever dedicated sports TV company, SiS Ltd. Here he honed the craft of C with real-time gambling software, whilst also learning C++ & .net technologies amongst others. After releasing numerous multi-million pound systems, over many years, he decided that he wanted a new challenge and left to become an iPhone programmer.
After a few weeks of starting his first app he spoke to an old friend, Mark Spofforth, about an idea he had for a social platform for food & drink. From this the seeds of lovefre.sh were sown. Geoff is now happy programming objective-C & Ruby on Rails with a bit of magic sprinkled in for good measure from the rest of the lovefre.sh team.
